Talk_PreChallenge03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>I am not in the habit of allowing voe to
pass by me, but you are a special case.<sp:0:2:2:7d00>

<sp:3:0:2:0901>You may pass!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_PreChallenge04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>The chief has already left for <clr:0000>Kara Kara
Bazaar<clr:ffff>! Aren't you supposed to join her
and back her up, voe?!
Talk_InKarakara:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><sp:0:2:2:7d00>What!<sp:5:1:0>


Are you?!<sp:5:1:0>


DOING HERE?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


The chief has already left for <clr:0000>Kara Kara
Bazaar<clr:ffff>! Aren't you supposed to join her
and back her up, voe?!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_PreDefense:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Those blasted things look like poisonous
mushrooms... And just like poisonous
mushrooms, they must be eliminated!
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900>I'll crush...<sp:5:0:0>every last one!<sp:5:1:0>


To dust!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:0:2:2:6400>And you'll be backing us up, won't you?<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_AfterChallenge:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Blond!<sp:5:1:0>


No abs!<sp:5:1:0>


Not a vai!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Normally we don't let voe pass through
here, but in your case...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>You may pass!
Talk_AfterChallenge_00:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>What's the matter? You can pass through!<sp:0:2:2:7d00>


<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0801>Despite being a voe, you helped us when
help was needed. The Gerudo owe you
for what you did!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_AfterDefense_00:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0800>Normally voe are forbidden from entering
this place, but you...

You have special permission from
the chief!<sp:0:2:2:7d00>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>You may pass!<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Your skills are very impressive!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
